overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "Little Brother's Coming Out" — Big brother Jeff Scott and his friend Chip Robertson get down to experienced activity in the hall outside the bedroom door where little brother Jeremy and his buddy Russ Williams are discovering each other in bed.  "A Cabin In The Woods" — Jeff Hunter and Pat Fulton are at a small ski resort cabin exploring the fresh joys of new young love. "Breaking Through" — College roommates Chad Scott (Tom Manley) and David Shaw in a sizzling locker room fantasy that leads to their living room for more mutual gratification.
title: Little Brother's Coming Out
